Articles.Content:
Hi guyz,

i'm from Czech Republic

the player...

guyz u did absolutely perfect job with physics .. my father is an astronomic man with contacts with astronauts

bud i have some idea for creators of this game...... 

 

and u know .... may be ... this idea is frequent..

 

can i use private email? because i think that it will upgrade this game to absolutely other level and make this game worldy known.......

Thanks

I'll looking for your reqest...... 

(perfect great game)

i wish you the best...

 

Daniel Tyl

 

send me an email .... not a reply..

This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggestions & Development. 

I'm afraid you can't expect a reply, though. The gamemakers are too busy to reply to each suggestion individually.

Hello,

thx for reply.. i have some ideas which (may be) can be helpful in online system of this .... i mean in synchronizatoin between players..

 

yes ... I absolutely understand that you all are very busy ... 

if you will be able to measure this .. just email....

 

and .. im not a programmer... im player.. 

Bye
